reviews.name: Disney - Cars Table Lamp
reviews.reviewText:
Okay, I had read the reviews on this lamp. Everyone complained on how it was sent to them that the base was not as pictured. It had turned out to be red & not like a wheel as it was shown in the ad.
Being I had searched all over online for a Cars lamp with a pull switch & Walmart was the only one that had it. Despite the reviews on the base issue I went ahead & ordered it because it was perfect for what I needed & so was the price. So I already knew what I was getting...no high hopes.
Well I get the item & to my surprise the lamp was exactly as shown. The base had the wheel as pictured, the pull switch had also a wheel at the end. It was a perfect size ...& the lighting amount was just right. I am using a 40w energy saver bulb and it lights up the room just right.
I'm so happy I went ahead and purchased it. My 3yr old was beside himself when he saw it. He could not stop turning it on & off. LOL.
I'm really happy with my purchase.
reviews.title: Love it....& so does my 3yr old.

reviews.name: Disney - Cars Table Lamp
reviews.reviewText: The picture shows the base of the map being a make believe tire. The actual lamp base is just a round red circle, completely different than pictured.
reviews.title: not what is pictured!

reviews.name: Disney - Cars Table Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Received this yesterday after having it shipped to my home. My son loves it! After reading the reviews I expected my base to be red but to my surprise my base was actually decorated as a wheel, just like the picture. The colors are not as bright but it's very cute!
reviews.title: My son loves it!

reviews.name: Disney - Cars Table Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I am very disappointed in this lamp!! The base is NOT a tire, it is just a plain red base. The lamp shade is very faded and dull. I am returning it.
reviews.title: not as pictured

reviews.name: Disney - Cars Table Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Like many others that reviewed this item, I was disappointed to not recieve the lamp I ordered. The shade is different, and the base is NOT made to look like a tire. It is a plain red disk. I would return it but I'd probably just get another one like it. If this is not important to others, then order it, but it is a $10.00 lamp, not a $24.00 lamp.
reviews.title: 01 August 2011
